title: 168 - Tone and Nick's Spelling Bee
description: Today’s episode is opened up with Ty Schmit who takes his turn as the host, welcoming the full house of boys onto the show today. The episode is lead off by a Nick vs. Tone spelling bee inspired by Mitt’s attempts at this here description. The boys jump into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today’s FOD consists of “The best chicken sandwich”, Friday Night Lights the tv show back on Netflix, translating alien messages, and much more.The episode is finished off with a Mitt style madlib to send you into the weekend. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
